CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many series are represented in this stream chart?

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Grocery Chains relative to Apparel Retailers?
SRP.A: Grocery Chains is {below} Apparel Retailers in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Electronics Vendors relative to Grocery Chains?
SRP.A: Electronics Vendors is {above} Grocery Chains in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Apparel Retailers relative to Electronics Vendors?
SRP.A: Apparel Retailers is {above} Electronics Vendors in the vertical direction.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total customer satisfaction score?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {Grocery Chains}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total customer satisfaction score?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {Electronics Vendors}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Grocery Chains's minimum Customer Satisfaction Score in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Grocery Chains's minimum Customer Satisfaction Score is in {1978}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Apparel Retailers's maximum Customer Satisfaction Score in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Apparel Retailers's maximum Customer Satisfaction Score is in {1988}.

NC.Q: Between 1978 and 1982, did the total Customer Satisfaction Score experience a larger or smaller change than between 1977 and 1982?
NC.A: The change in total customer satisfaction score between 1978 and 1982 was {larger} than between 1977 and 1982.

NC.Q: Between 1981 and 1987, did the total Customer Satisfaction Score experience a larger or smaller change than between 1978 and 1983?
NC.A: The change in total customer satisfaction score between 1981 and 1987 was {smaller} than between 1978 and 1983.

NC.Q: Between 1977 and 1979, was the average total Customer Satisfaction Score higher or lower than between 1983 and 1987?
NC.A: The average total customer satisfaction score between 1977 and 1979 was {higher} than between 1983 and 1987.

NC.Q: Was the total Customer Satisfaction Score in 1979 higher or lower than in 1987?
NC.A: The total customer satisfaction score in 1979 was {higher} than in 1987.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, which one held the dominant position for the longest period of time?
MSR.A: {Grocery Chains} held the dominant position for the longest period of time.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, in which year did Apparel Retailers and Electronics Vendors first exchange dominant positions?
MSR.A: Apparel Retailers and Electronics Vendors first exchanged leading positions in {1978}.
